dcterms:creator: B. Cs. Cs´aji
M. C. Campi
E. Weyer
dcterms:description: A new system identification approach for constructing exact non-asymptotic confidence regions in linear regression models, which assumes independent (but potentially time-varying) noise terms symmetric about zero.
dcterms:title: Sign-Perturbed Sums (SPS)

dcterms:creator: S. Kolumb´an
I. Vajk
J. Schoukens
dcterms:description: Methods for hypothesis testing and the structure of corresponding confidence sets, which generalize the idea of perturbing datasets.
dcterms:title: Perturbed datasets methods

dcterms:creator: L. Ljung
dcterms:description: A comprehensive resource on system identification theory, covering various models including FIR and Generalised FIR models.
dcterms:title: Asymptotic confidence ellipsoids

dcterms:creator: E. L. Lehmann
J. P. Romano
dcterms:description: A foundational text on statistical hypothesis testing, including Monte Carlo and bootstrap methods.
dcterms:title: Monte Carlo or bootstrap methods

dcterms:creator: J. Nyblom
dcterms:description: A study on permutation tests in linear regression, providing insights into non-parametric methods.
dcterms:title: Linear regression problems

dcterms:creator: S. Kolumb´an
I. Vajk
J. Schoukens
dcterms:description: Methods for hypothesis testing and the structure of corresponding confidence sets, specifically focusing on residual-permuted sums.
dcterms:title: Residual-Permuted Sums (RPS)
